To Market is a platform that connects purveyors of local edible goods directly to restaurants and chefs that need them the most. It's a simple online marketplace for sourcing and selling the highest quality local goods.

Technical lead and technical product owner for 2 hybrid teams (12+ members) comprised of consultants and FTEs who are both local and remote.  We built a calendar synchronization solution for several major calendar providers (primarily Google, iCloud, Outlook, Android and Apple devices) as well as a public API to allow third party integration.  Responsible for product definition, technical leadership and architectural vision.Responsible for design and rollout of a cloud (AWS) environment solution to make critical infrastructure services both redundant and location independent.  Migrated initial services from private datacenter to combination cloud and private hosting.

Responsible for the design and delivery of several high value, aggressively scheduled projects for Go Daddy. One of my teams built a user portal on Rails in just 8 weeks to support the relaunch of four major hosting products. The other built a migration system that allowed the automatic migration of over 5 million user accounts from legacy platforms to next-gen hosting products, all without human intervention.

Primary Developer of the Customer Experience Monitor- a realtime performance monitoring and response engine, which monitors the hosting environment and is capable of automatically detecting and containing runaway user behavior before it impacts customers.Used big data analysis and process improvement techniques to identify performance issues in several hosting environments.  Insights enabled the team to make performance improvements and increase hosting performance by a factor of five.  Technical lead for several systems for global monitoring and automated error detection and correction.
Designed and developed compliance software for use by Payment Card Industry auditors in PCI level 1 audits.
Developed new services and integrations to completely replace legacy policy systems.
Web Developer focused on fixing bugs and adding features to the Business Placement Office web site and backend systems.
Summer Intern (June-August '96, '97, '98) focused on installing networks, pc installation and troubleshooting, and small business website creation and hosting services.
